ygData.subject: Showdown

Subject: Showdown
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen:




Vehement smiled evily at Smokescreen, charging forward with a wide swing with 
his large blade.

Smokescreen ducked under the slash and swung his sword downward, the blade 
cutting into Vehement's armored side, not penetrating.  "You won't get the 
Key without a painful fight!"

The Brotherhood Archbishop laughed.  "It will only be painful for you." he 
said as he sent an elbow out, knocking Smokescreen back a few feet as the 
metal join connected with his right temple.  The blow caused the Maximal to 
shake his head after he stopped moving to try and make the room stop spinning 
around him.

"On the subject you won't die, just be knocked into stasis lock.  I shall let 
my Dark Lord slay you." Vehement laughed as he charged forward, stabbing 
forward with his blade.  The metallic blade pierced through Smokescreen's 
relatively weak armor, penetrating out the other side.  The Archbishop smiled 
at the sight of his seven foot long broadsword sticking through Smokescreen's 
abdomen.

"I'm...not...going...down...that easily..." Smokescreen spat up mech-fluid as 
he tried to speak, his talk gurgled.  He fired an optic blast off at 
Vehement, the laser energy piercing into the Archbishop's left cheek.

The Brotherhood leader let go of his sword, Smokescreen falling to the ground 
in stasis lock.  Gripping his left cheek with a hand he could tell the wound 
had gone deep, but hadn't damaged any vital components.  Lucky for Vehement, 
Smokescreen's vision still told him the room was spinning.  "Garbage!" he 
yelled, kicking the side of Smokescreen's head.

Reaching down Vehement picked up Smokescreen by the throat, lifting him up 
until his feet were a few feet from the ground.  Putting his free hand 
forward, his outstretched palm began emitting sonic waves at Smokescreen's 
cheset.

-Prepare to take down the shields and then head back to base on my command- 
the dark warrior said via inner monologue comm. to Sun Crusher and Reflector, 
who hovered outside the bridge, weapons aimed at the hole in the CF.

Vehement felt a shake and cursed.  "What was that!" he yelled, knowing his 
minions could hear him.

"I'm detecting another hole in the Cybertronian Fire, the main entry way to 
the CF was blown apart somehow.  Shields are still up." Reflector reported.

"Excellent." Vehement smiled, still emitting sonic waves at Smokescreen's 
chest, breaking it apart quickly at the molecular level.
